TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit HttpClientJsonExtensions extends System.Object
public ref class HttpClientJsonExtensions abstract sealed

Docs.summary: Extension methods for working with JSON APIs.

Docs.summary: Sends a GET request to the specified URI, and parses the JSON response body to create an object of the generic type.
Docs.returns: The response parsed as an object of the generic type.
